Pre-Game Insights: Both teams aim to build momentum for the Super Eights at the Daren Sammy National Stadium in Saint Lucia.West Indies cricketers are looking to score some huge runs on a high-scoring pitch.Afghanistan's spinners, including Rashid Khan, have been dominant in the tournament.Momentum is crucial for both teams as they prepare for the Super Eights.The match is a battle of one-upmanship between the two teams.West Indies and Afghanistan are both aiming for a strong performance in the tournament.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is the final group stage match of the T20 World Cup.Both teams have already advanced to the Super Eights.The pitch at the Darren Sammy National Stadium is among the best in the Caribbean.The game is important for both teams' momentum heading into the Super Eights.The teams are focusing on consistent performance and key player contributions.
